      • doAddConlet

        public String doAddConlet(AddConletRequest event,
                          ConsoleSession consoleSession)
                   throws Exception
        Description copied from class: AbstractConlet

        Called by AbstractConlet.onAddConletRequest(org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletRequest, org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConsoleSession) to complete adding the web console component. If the web console component has associated state, the implementation should call AbstractConlet.putInSession(Session, String, Serializable) to create the state and put it in the session.

        Specified by:
        doAddConlet in class AbstractConlet<SysInfoConlet.SysInfoModel>
        Parameters:
        event - the event
        consoleSession - the channel
        Returns:
        the id of the created web console component
        Throws:
        Exception

      • doDeleteConlet

        protected void doDeleteConlet(DeleteConletRequest event,
                              ConsoleSession consoleSession,
                              String conletId,
                              SysInfoConlet.SysInfoModel retrievedState)
                       throws Exception
        Description copied from class: AbstractConlet

        Called by AbstractConlet.onDeleteConletRequest(org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.DeleteConletRequest, org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConsoleSession) to complete deleting the web console component. If the web console component component wants to veto the deletion of the web console component, it puts the state information back in the session with AbstractConlet.putInSession(Session, String, Serializable) and does not fire the DeleteConlet event.

        Specified by:
        doDeleteConlet in class AbstractConlet<SysInfoConlet.SysInfoModel>
        Parameters:
        event - the event
        consoleSession - the channel
        conletId - the web console component id
        retrievedState - the web console component state
        Throws:
        Exception
